JSRDotNETSDK Reference

PulserSettingInfo.SetPropertyValue Method

PulserSettingInfo Class  See Also

Sets the value of a property such as GainMin. While the setting name is 'Gain', there are possibly many properties associated with the gain setting. This method allows the writing of those properties, even if they aren't defined in the IPulserReceiver interface. For example, to write to the GainIndex property, this method could be used like: pulserSettingInfo.SetPropertyValue(pulser, PulserPropertyRole.Index, (object)1);
